body_html:
I am about to internally make the change to bazel 0.4.
we should have bazel 0.4 everywhere on Wednesday.

On Mon, Nov 7, 2016 at 7:08 PM, David Z. Chen notifications@github.com
wrote:

@jart https://github.com/jart To clarify, is this blocked on the
release following 0.3.2?

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

body:
I am about to internally make the change to bazel 0.4.
we should have bazel 0.4 everywhere on Wednesday.

On Mon, Nov 7, 2016 at 7:08 PM, David Z. Chen notifications@github.com
wrote:

> @jart https://github.com/jart To clarify, is this blocked on the
> release following 0.3.2?
